snippet.title: Legend of Edda: Pegasus - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Legend of Edda is a Greek Mythology-themed PC MMORPG inspired by classic titles. The game takes place in the Heroic Age of Greek mythology, bringing the war between the Olympian gods and the Titans. The player must choose one of the sides and venture into this world full of magic and challenges.

Download now on Steam: https://bit.ly/LegendOfEdda_Pegasus
